description.brazilian: Você abriu o livro pela primeira vez.
description.english: You have opened the book for the first time.
description.french: Vous avez ouvert le livre pour la première fois.
description.german: Du hast das Buch zum ersten Mal geöffnet.
description.italian: Hai aperto il libro per la prima volta.
description.russian: Вы впервые открыли книгу.
description.spanish: Has abierto el libro por primera vez.

description.brazilian: Crie uma espada mágica (Tempestade de Fogo, Espinho de Inverno ou Lâmina Vazia).
description.english: Craft a magical sword (Firestorm, Winterthorne or Void Blade)
description.french: Fabriquez une épée magique (Tempête de feu, Épine d’hiver ou Lame du vide).
description.german: Schmiede ein magisches Schwert (Feuersturm, Winterdorn oder Klinge der Leere).
description.italian: Fabbrica una spada magica (Tempesta di Fuoco, Spina di Ghiaccio o Lama del Vuoto).
description.russian: Создайте магический меч (Огненный шторм, Зимний шип или Меч пустоты).
description.spanish: Crea un arma mágica (Firestorm, Winterthorne o Hoja Vacía).

displayName.french: Le renard a-t-il fait son choix ?

description.brazilian: Faça sua primeira escolha.
description.english: Make your first choice.
description.french: Effectuez votre premier choix.
description.german: Triff deine erste Entscheidung.
description.italian: Fai la tua prima scelta.
description.russian: Сделайте свой первый выбор.
description.spanish: Elige lo que quieras.

displayName.spanish: Quien lo encuentra se lo queda

description.brazilian: Abra 10 baús pequenos.
description.english: Open 10 small chests.
description.french: Ouvrez 10 petits coffres.
description.german: Öffne 10 kleine Kisten.
description.italian: Apri 10 forzieri piccoli.
description.russian: Откройте 10 маленьких сундуков.
description.spanish: Abre 10 cofres pequeños.

description.brazilian: Destrua 100 objetos inanimados.
description.english: Destroy 100 inanimate objects.
description.french: Détruisez 100 objets inanimés.
description.german: Zerstöre 100 unbelebte Gegenstände.
description.italian: Distruggi 100 oggetti inanimati.
description.russian: Разрушьте 100 неодушевленных объектов.
description.spanish: Destruye 100 objetos inertes.

displayName.brazilian: O Bom, o Mau e o Soldado
displayName.english: The Good, the Bad and the Grunt
displayName.french: Le Bon, la Brute et le Grogneur
displayName.german: Die Guten, die Bösen und die Schildträger
displayName.italian: Il buono, il cattivo e il soldato semplice
displayName.spanish: El Bueno, el Malo y el Gruñón

description.brazilian: Livre-se de 75 Corvos Soldados.
description.english: Get rid of 75 Raven Grunts.
description.french: Éliminez 75 soldats corbeaux.
description.german: Hol dir 75 Raben-Schildträger.
description.italian: Liberati di 75 Corvi soldato.
description.russian: Избавьтесь от 75 Воронов-пехотинцев.
description.spanish: Líbrate de 75 Cuervos gruñones.

description.brazilian: Corte 50 Corvos Feiticeiros em dois.
description.english: Slice 50 Raven Warlocks in two.
description.french: Découpez 50 corbeaux sorciers en deux.
description.german: Schneide 50 Raben-Zauberer entzwei.
description.italian: Affetta in due 50 Corvi stregoni.
description.russian: Разрубите пополам 50 Воронов-колдунов.
description.spanish: Corta por la mitad a 50 Hechiceros Cuervo.

displayName.brazilian: Será um Soldado? Em uma lata?
displayName.english: Is it a Grunt? In a can?
displayName.german: Ist es ein Schildträger? In einer Dose?
displayName.italian: È un soldato semplice? In un bidone?

description.brazilian: Mostre a 25 Corvos com Escudo que a melhor defesa é mesmo o ataque.
description.english: Show 25 Shield Ravens that the best defence is actually offence.
description.french: Montrez à 25 corbeaux boucliers que la meilleure défense, c’est l’attaque.
description.german: Zeige 25 Schildraben, dass Angriff die beste Verteidigung ist.
description.italian: Mostra a 25 Corvi con scudo che la miglior difesa è l'attacco.
description.russian: Покажите 25 Воронам-щитоносцам, что лучшая защита - это нападение.
description.spanish: Demuestra a 25 Cuervos Escudo que la mejor defensa es un ataque.

displayName.german: Mit einem BUMM ist es rum!

description.brazilian: Ajude 25 Corvos Explosivos a ir pelos ares.
description.english: Help 25 Explosive Ravens do just that.
description.french: Aidez 25 corbeaux explosifs à remplir leur rôle.
description.german: Hilf 25 explodierenden Raben, das herauszufinden.
description.italian: Aiuta 25 Corvi esplosivi a fare il proprio lavoro.
description.russian: Помогите 25 Воронам-подрывникам подорваться.
description.spanish: Ayuda a 25 Cuervos Explosivos a que lo hagan.

description.brazilian: Coloque 25 Predadores a dormir. A espécie eterna.
description.english: Put 25 Predators to sleep. The eternal kind.
description.french: Plongez 25 prédateurs dans un sommeil...du genre définitif.
description.german: Lass 25 Raubtiere einschlafen. Und zwar für immer.
description.italian: Metti a nanna 25 Predatori. L'eterno bambino.
description.russian: Погрузите 25 Хищников в спячку. Вечную спячку.
description.spanish: Pon 25 predadores a dormir. El sueño eterno.

description.brazilian: Encontre sua primeira joia.
description.english: Find your first gem.
description.french: Trouvez votre première gemme.
description.german: Finde dein erstes Juwel.
description.italian: Trova la tua prima gemma.
description.russian: Найдите свой первый самоцвет.
description.spanish: Encuentra tu primera Gema.

description.brazilian: Descubra mais sobre o comportamento de Zenobia.
description.english: Find out more about Zenobia's behaviour.
description.french: Apprenez-en plus sur le comportement de Zenobia.
description.german: Finde mehr über Zenobias Verhalten heraus.
description.italian: Scopri qualcosa in più sul comportamento di Zenobia.
description.russian: Узнайте больше о поведении Зенобии.
description.spanish: Averigua más sobre el comportamiento de Zenobia.

description.brazilian: Descubra o segredinho de Lapino.
description.english: Discover Lapino's little secret.
description.french: Découvrez le petit secret de Lapino.
description.german: Entdecke Lapinos kleines Geheimnis.
description.italian: Scopri il piccolo segreto di Lapino.
description.russian: Раскройте маленькую тайну Лапино.
description.spanish: Descubre el secreto de Lapino.

description.brazilian: Siga a voz da Pedra de Iblis para saber qual sua meta.
description.english: Follow the Iblis Stone's voice to learn its goal.
description.french: Suivez la voix de la Pierre d’Iblis pour connaître son but.
description.german: Folge der Stimme des Iblis-Steins, um sein Vorhaben aufzudecken.
description.italian: Segui la voce della Pietra di Iblis per apprendere il suo obiettivo.
description.russian: Следуйте голосу Камня Иблиса, чтобы узнать о его цели.
description.spanish: Haz caso a la Piedra Iblis para descubrir su objetivo.

displayName.brazilian: É como uma pequena Estrela da Morte.
displayName.english: It's like a small Death Star
displayName.french: Une sorte de mini Étoile noire
displayName.italian: È come una piccola stella assassina
displayName.spanish: Es como una estrella fugaz pequeña.

description.brazilian: Descubra por que o Skyripper estava tão bem escondido.
description.english: Find out why the Skyripper was so well hidden.
description.french: Découvrez pourquoi le Skyripper était si bien caché.
description.german: Finde heraus, weshalb Skyripper so gut versteckt war.
description.italian: Scopri perché la Squartacieli era così ben nascosta.
description.russian: Узнайте, почему Неборез был так надежно спрятан.
description.spanish: Averigua por qué el Skyripper está tan bien escondido.

description.brazilian: A curiosidade nunca matou ninguém, certo? Abra seu primeiro caminho secundário.
description.english: Curiosity never killed anyone right? Open your first secondary path.
description.french: Être curieux n’a jamais tué personne, si ? Ouvrez votre premier chemin secondaire.
description.german: Neugier hat noch keinen umgebracht, stimmt's? Öffne deinen ersten Sekundärpfad.
description.italian: La curiosità non ha mai ucciso nessuno, vero? Apri il tuo primo sentiero secondario.
description.russian: От любопытства еще никто не умирал, так ведь? Откройте первый альтернативный путь.
description.spanish: La curiosidad nunca ha matado a nadie, ¿verdad= Abre tu primera ruta secundaria.

displayName.german: Zeig mir, was du drauf hast

description.brazilian: Atinja um combo de 30 hits.
description.english: Achieve a 30 hit combo.
description.french: Réalisez un combo de 30 coups.
description.german: Erreiche eine Treffer-Kombo von 30.
description.italian: Raggiungi una combo di 30 colpi.
description.russian: Доведите комбо до 30 очков.
description.spanish: Consigue un combo de 30 puntos.

description.brazilian: Aproxime 50 inimigos de você.
description.english: Bring 50 enemies closer to you.
description.french: Rapprochez 50 ennemis.
description.german: Bringe 50 Gegner näher zu dir.
description.italian: Fai avvicinare a te 50 nemici
description.russian: Подтяните к себе 50 врагов.
description.spanish: Acerca 50 enemigos a ti.

displayName.brazilian: Você não sabe nada, Raposa do Ártico!
displayName.french: Tu ne sais rien du tout, Jon Snow.
displayName.russian: Северный лис, ты ничего не знаешь!
displayName.spanish: ¡No sabes nada, zorro de las nieves!

description.brazilian: Se enganche gastando seu primeiro ponto de habilidade.
description.english: Get hooked by spending your first skill point.
description.french: Devenez accro en dépensant vos premiers points d'aptitude.
description.german: Gib deinen ersten Fertigkeitspunkt aus.
description.italian: Fatti agganciare spendendo il primo punto abilità.
description.russian: Потратьте первое очко умений. Вам понравится.
description.spanish: Engánchate gastando tu primer punto de habilidad.

displayName.french: Un petit tour et c'est gagné

description.brazilian: As rotundas são legais, mas não tanto assim.
description.english: Roundabouts are fun, but not too much.
description.french: Les manèges, c'est bien mais faut pas en abuser.
description.german: Karussells sind klasse, zumindest in Maßen.
description.italian: Le rotonde sono divertenti, ma neanche troppo.
description.russian: Окольные пути - это весело, но не слишком.
description.spanish: Las rotondas son divertidas, pero no demasiado.

description.brazilian: Lembre-se de seus antigos talentos gastando 15 pontos de habilidade.
description.english: Remember your old talents by spending 15 skill points.
description.french: Dépensez 15 points d’aptitude pour faire ressurgir vos anciens talents.
description.german: Erinnere dich an deine alten Talente, indem du 15 Fertigkeitspunkte ausgibst.
description.italian: Ricorda i tuoi vecchi talenti spendendo 15 punti abilità.
description.russian: Вспомните свои былые таланты, потратив 15 очков умений.
description.spanish: Recuerda tu talento gastando 15 puntos de habilidad.

displayName.brazilian: Masamune é para os malvados melancólicos.
displayName.english: Masamune is for melancholic bad guys
displayName.italian: Masamune è per i tipi cattivi e malinconici
displayName.russian: Масамунэ - это для унылых плохих парней
displayName.spanish: Masamune es para los chicos malos melancólicos

description.brazilian: Volte a colocar sua espada na forja para melhorá-la.
description.english: Take your sword back to the forge to improve it.
description.french: Rapportez votre épée à la forge pour l’améliorer.
description.german: Bring dein Schwert zur Schmiede, um es zu verbessern.
description.italian: Riporta la tua spada alla fornace per migliorarla.
description.russian: Принесите свой меч в кузницу, чтобы улучшить его.
description.spanish: Lleva tu espada a la forja para mejorarla.

description.brazilian: Vejamos o que há ali. Vá a cada ilha de Boreas.
description.english: Let's see what's out there. Set foot on every island of Boreas.
description.french: Allons voir ce qui se cache là-bas. Posez le pied sur chaque îlot de Boréas.
description.german: Lass uns sehen, was es da draußen so alles gibt. Besuche jede Insel Boreas'.
description.italian: Vediamo quello che c'è là fuori. Metti piede su ogni isola di Boreas.
description.russian: Посмотрим, что там есть. Побывайте на всех островах Борея.
description.spanish: Veamos qué hay por ahí. Pon pie en cada una de las islas de Boreas.

description.brazilian: Ooooh, que brilhante! Encontre uma joia de nível 3.
description.english: Ooooh, shiny! Find a level 3 gem.
description.french: Ooooh, brillant ! Trouvez une gemme de niveau 3.
description.german: Ooooh, es glänzt! Finde ein Level 3-Juwel.
description.italian: Oooh, brillante! Trova una gemma di livello 3.
description.russian: О, как блестит! Найдите самоцвет 3-го уровня.
description.spanish: ¡Brillante! encuentra una Gema de nivel 3.

description.brazilian: Tire as penas a 500 Corvos mortos.
description.english: Pick the feathers off 500 dead Ravens.
description.french: Plumez 500 corbeaux morts.
description.german: Nimm dir die Federn von 500 toten Raben.
description.italian: Raccogli le piume di 500 Corvi morti.
description.russian: Соберите перья 500 мертвых Воронов.
description.spanish: Quita las plumas de 500 Cuervos muertos.

description.brazilian: Faça "pesquisa" sobre cada tipo de inimigo. Com sua espada.
description.english: Do "research" on each type of enemy. With your sword.
description.french: Faites de la « recherche » sur chaque type d’ennemi. Avec comme instrument, votre épée.
description.german: Betreibe für jeden Gegnertyp "Forschung". Mit deinem Schwert.
description.italian: Fai "ricerche" su ciascun tipo di nemico. Con la tua spada.
description.russian: "Исследуйте" все виды врагов. Мечом.
description.spanish: "Investiga" en todo tipo de enemigo. Con tu espada.

displayName.brazilian: Será uma espada? Será uma chave?
displayName.english: Is it a sword? Is it a key?
displayName.french: Est-ce une épée ? Est-ce une clé ?
displayName.german: Ist es ein Schwert? Ist es ein Schlüssel?
displayName.italian: È una spada? È una chiave?

description.brazilian: Use cada espada para abrir uma porta diferente.
description.english: Use each sword to open a different door.
description.french: Utilisez toutes les épées pour ouvrir une porte différente.
description.german: Öffne mit jedem Schwert eine andere Tür.
description.italian: Usa ogni spada per aprire una porta diversa.
description.russian: Используйте все мечи для открытия разных дверей.
description.spanish: Usa cada espada para abrir una puerta diferente.

description.brazilian: Morra um máximo 5 vezes durante uma história.
description.english: Die a maximum of 5 times in a story.
description.french: Mourrez 5 fois au maximum pour obtenir des renseignements.
description.german: Stirb höchstens 5 Mal in einer Geschichte.
description.italian: Morire non più di 5 volte in una storia.
description.russian: Прогибните не более 5 раз за историю.
description.spanish: Muere un máximo de 5 veces en una historia.

description.brazilian: Atinja um combo de 60 hits.
description.english: Achieve a 60 hit combo.
description.french: Réalisez un combo de 60 coups.
description.german: Erreiche eine Treffer-Kombo von 60.
description.italian: Raggiungi una combo di 60 colpi.
description.russian: Доведите комбо до 60 очков.
description.spanish: Consigue un combo de 60 puntos.

displayName.french: Apprendre à un vieux renard à faire des nouveaux tours
displayName.spanish: Nuevos trucos a un zorro viejo

description.brazilian: Use cada truque no livro durante um encontro de combate.
description.english: Use every trick in the book during a combat encounter.
description.french: Utilisez tous les tours du livre au cours d’un combat.
description.german: Nutze während eines Kampfes jeden Trick, den du kennst.
description.italian: Usa ogni trucco da manuale durante un combattimento.
description.russian: Используйте в схватке все трюки из книги.
description.spanish: Usa todos los trucos del libro en un combate.

description.brazilian: Abra 50 baús pequenos e encontre espaço para todas estas delícias.
description.english: Open 50 small chests and find space for all those goodies.
description.french: Ouvrez 50 petits coffres et trouvez de la place pour tous ces cadeaux.
description.german: Öffne 50 kleine Kisten, um genügend Platz für die ganzen tollen Sachen zu machen.
description.italian: Apri 50 forzieri piccoli e trova spazio per tutti quei doni.
description.russian: Откройте 50 маленьких сундуков и найдите место для всего этого добра.
description.spanish: Abre 50 cofres pequeños y encuentra espacio para todas las cosas.

description.brazilian: Seja cuidadoso e termine um nível sem sofrer danos do início ao fim, depois de obter o livro.
description.english: Be careful and finish a level without taking damage from start to finish, after obtaining the book.
description.french: Soyez prudent et terminez un niveau sans subir aucun dégât, après avoir obtenu le livre.
description.german: Sei vorsichtig und schließe ein Level von Anfang bis Ende ab, ohne Schaden zu nehmen (nachdem du das Buch erhalten hast).
description.italian: Fai attenzione e finisci un livello senza subire danni dall'inizio alla fine, dopo aver ottenuto il libro.
description.russian: Будьте осторожны. После получения книги пройдите уровень от начала до конца, не получив урона.
description.spanish: Ten cuidado y termina un nivel sin recibir ningún daño de principio a fin, después de conseguir el libro.

description.brazilian: Procure tesouros fabulosos em 25 baús épicos.
description.english: Look for fabulous treasures in 25 epic chests.
description.french: Cherchez de fabuleux trésors dans 25 coffres épiques.
description.german: Suche in 25 Kisten nach fantastischen Schätzen.
description.italian: Cerca tesori favolosi in 25 forzieri epici.
description.russian: Ищите сказочные сокровища в 25 эпических сундуках.
description.spanish: Busca fascinantes tesoros en 25 cofres épicos.

description.brazilian: Você descobriu todas as informações que o livro poderia mostrar para você.
description.english: You have discovered all intel the book could show you.
description.french: Vous avez découvert toutes les infos que le livre pouvait vous indiquer.
description.german: Du hast alle Informationen aus dem Buch entdeckt.
description.italian: Hai scoperto tutte le informazioni che il libro poteva mostrarti.
description.russian: Вы обнаружили все сведения, которые книга может вам сообщить.
description.spanish: Has descubierto todo lo que el libro de datos podía enseñarte.

displayName.spanish: A Hanzo le hubiesen gustado estas

description.brazilian: Forje todas as espadas o melhor que puder.
description.english: Forge all swords and make them as best as you can.
description.french: Forgez toutes les épées et donnez le meilleur de vous-même.
description.german: Schmiede alle Schwerter so gut du nur kannst.
description.italian: Forgia tutte le spade e realizzale al meglio che puoi.
description.russian: Создайте в кузнице все мечи и улучшите их до предела.
description.spanish: Forja todas las espadas y hazlo lo mejor que puedas.

description.brazilian: Faça todas as escolhas certas.
description.english: Make all the right choices.
description.french: Faites tous les choix correctement.
description.german: Treffe alle richtigen Entscheidungen.
description.italian: Fare tutte le scelte adeguate.
description.russian: Сделайте все правильные выборы.
description.spanish: Toma todas las decisiones correctas.

description.brazilian: Quando reunir todo o conhecimento, você será recompensado.
description.english: Once all knowledge you have, rewarded you will be.
description.french: Quand tout le savoir vous aurez, récompensé vous serez.
description.german: Wenn alles Wissen du besitzt. belohnt du wirst.
description.italian: Quando tutta la conoscenza avrai, ricompensato sarai.
description.russian: Все знанье постигнув, получишь награду.
description.spanish: Cuando toda la sabiduría poseas, recompensado serás.
